Package org.spongepowered.api.projectile.source

Interface BlockProjectileSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProjectileSource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Dispenser
    public interface BlockProjectileSource
extends ProjectileSource
    Represents a ProjectileSource that is a block. Examples are Dispensers.
